pages.text: The $(d)Mask of the Blessed Night$() is a unique mask worn by Ancient Keepers of the Flame. This mask grants its wearer the ability to see all sorts of hidden details about a candle.
Using some Blessed Wax and a Rune of the Cursed Night you can easily craft your own version of this ancient relic.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: The $(d)Mask of the Blessed Night$() will allow its wearer to see the radius of a Candle. Flame Types and Crystal Effects can all be viewed while wearing this mask. The mask also illuminates those that wear it.
